locations.name: Athens
locations.description: The capital of Greece, where the tour begins, known for ancient landmarks like the Acropolis and the charming Plaka district.

locations.name: Milos
locations.description: A volcanic island famous for its unique landscapes, colourful beaches (like Sarakiniko), sea caves, and distinctive fishing villages.

locations.name: Sifnos
locations.description: An island celebrated for its gastronomy, pottery, picturesque whitewashed villages, and scenic walking trails.

locations.name: Naxos
locations.description: The largest island in the Cyclades, offering a mix of history (Portara), mountainous inland villages, olive groves, and extensive sandy beaches.
